name: Ache Torpedo
additionalNotes:
Full Body - A Clean , Bright Spice - A 4 leaf blend featuring leaves from Ecuador, Santo Domingo, Nicaragua, & Mexico.

Ache (Pronounced Aaah Chay) is a Congo-African word that means “Blessing”.
Our Mascot / Complaint Department here at The House of Cigars is a 6 year old German Rottweiler named Ache Casanova Martinez!

This is his blend …a perfect companion…strong and steady…with a little bit of bite!!! Just kidding :)
However, we did make this blend to honor a Rottweiler, so there is definitely some “muscle” in this cigar. But we have paid special attention to developing good, rich character in this smoke, just as we have with him.

 The Ache blend is a very clean smoke with a beautiful white ash. This blend is bright & crisp & very clean. It is playfully spicy on your palate. Originally created in the light & creamy Connecticut Shade Wrapper, this cigar is an excellent afternoon or evening smoke.

Ache is very popular among our local VIP's and so is his blend.
